lynx.bliss.widget.preferences.IncognitoP.android:title: What exactly is Kyotokek?
lynx.bliss.widget.preferences.IncognitoP.android:summary: Kyotokek is a modified client for Kik Messenger which implements everything that was great about previous modified Kik clients with tons of features to enhance your experience added as a bonus. Go give them a try!

lynx.bliss.widget.preferences.HelpPrefer.android:title: Kiyo [Creator & Supreme Overlord]
lynx.bliss.widget.preferences.HelpPrefer.android:summary: "Whatever it is you want me to do, I won't do it."

lynx.bliss.widget.preferences.HelpPrefer.android:title: MYB, Kuugo [Co-Creator]
lynx.bliss.widget.preferences.HelpPrefer.android:summary: He was the one who originally came up with the idea for Kyotokek and also made some icon concepts. But he has since left as he has other priorities, so he wasn\'t able to write a description.

lynx.bliss.widget.preferences.HelpPrefer.android:title: Blade [Lead Dev... ONLY Dev.]
lynx.bliss.widget.preferences.HelpPrefer.android:summary: I made the settings work. PS: Java fucking sucks. PPS: DON'T pm me asking about mods...

lynx.bliss.widget.preferences.HelpPrefer.android:title: Shieldzee [Icon Design & UI]
lynx.bliss.widget.preferences.HelpPrefer.android:summary: He's certified for digital design. No, seriously.
